languages.text: Авангардами, возглавляющими атаку и привлекающими на себя вражеский огонь, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеры{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воины{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.
languages.original_text: Авангардами, возглавляющими атаку и привлекающими на себя вражеский огонь, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеры{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воины{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Leaders and Fighters can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire to themselves.
Leaders and Fighters can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire to themselves.
Leaders and Fighters can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziere{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} können zu Angehörigen der Vorhut werden, lebende Bollwerke, die feindliches Feuer auf sich ziehen.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.

traits.locale_text: Anführer und Kämpfer können zu Angehörigen der Vorhut werden, lebende Bollwerke, die feindliches Feuer auf sich ziehen.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officiers{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerriers{/g} peuvent devenir des patrouilleurs, des remparts vivants qui attirent les tirs ennemis sur eux.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.

traits.locale_text: Les Leaders et les Combattants peuvent devenir Patrouilleurs, des remparts vivants qui attirent les tirs ennemis sur eux.

Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leaders{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Combattants{/g} peuvent devenir Patrouilleurs, des remparts vivants qui attirent les tirs ennemis sur eux.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}可以晋级为先锋。先锋是屹立不倒的血肉堡垒，会吸引敌人的火力攻击自己。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.

traits.locale_text: 领袖与战士可以晋级为先锋。先锋是屹立不倒的血肉堡垒，会吸引敌人的火力攻击自己。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}は敵の攻撃を自らに引き寄せる生ける砦であるヴァンガードになることができる。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.

traits.locale_text: リーダーとファイターは敵の攻撃を自らに引き寄せる生ける砦であるヴァンガードになることができる。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficiales{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerreros{/g} pueden convertirse en vanguardias, bastiones vivientes que acaparan el fuego enemigo.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.

traits.locale_text: Los líderes y los guerreros pueden convertirse en vanguardias, bastiones vivientes que acaparan el fuego enemigo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subaylar{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçılar{/g}, düşman ateşini üstüne çeken canlı bir kalkan olan Öncü'ye dönüşebilirler.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Vanguards, living bulwarks who draw enemy fire upon themselves.
